name: Rescue at sea
description:
Jam # 02

Rescue At Sea has a survival and adventure type theme in a wooden ship in the old pirate style, in which the main character must overcome obstacles, elements and enemies that prevent him from saving his son. Due to its theme and environment, it has an ESRB rating for all types of audiences.

Rescue At Sea is based on the story of Merlin, a father who must rescue his son after having fallen into the sea and being kidnapped by pirates, Merlin must survive the flooding of this ship in order to accomplish his goal, rescue his son and save their lives. It will present different obstacles to reach him.

 Trello      GitHub   GDD

Developed by:

-Andrea Mejia (Game Programmer)

-Jhon Aza (Audio designer)

-Diana Diaz (Artist 3D)
